Package net.fender.sql

Interface Summary
ConnectionFactory  
 

Class Summary
DriverConnectionFactory Supports encrypted user name and password to appease DBAs and SOX404 auditors.
DriverDataSource Simply calls driver.connect(url, properties), returning a new connection every time.
JdbcUtils Null-safe util to close various SQL objects, suppressing all Exceptions.
LoadBalancingDataSource  
ManagedConnection Delegates all operations to wrapped connection, except close, which is handled by ConnectionManager.
ManagedConnectionDataSource  
PoolableConnectionFactory<T extends Connection>  
PoolingDataSource TODO Implement ability to grow to a max size
RoundRobinLoadBalancingDataSource  
SingleConnectionDataSource This DataSource recycles a single connection.
WeightedLoadBalancingDataSource Uses relative weighting to randomly select a DataSource.
 

Enum Summary
ResultSetHoldability Simple enum wrapper around ResultSet's HOLD_CURSORS_OVER_COMMIT and CLOSE_CURSORS_AT_COMMIT.
TransactionIsolation Simple enum wrapper around Connection.TRANSACTION_*.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidConnectionException
